text: Colin Dettmer (26 September 1958 - 12 January 2010) was a South African cricketer who played in twenty-one first-class and twelve List A matches between 1991 and 1995. He shot himself dead at the age of 51. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1958 births Category:2010 deaths Category:South African cricketers Category:Boland cricketers Category:North West cricketers Category:Cricketers from Cape Town Category:Cricketers who committed suicide Category:Suicides by firearm in South Africa
title: Colin Dettmer
